description: System-generated unique identifier for this profile-based purchase order status transition rule.
Identifier of the user role/profile that this purchase order status transition permission applies to; likely a foreign key to a user profile table.
Code for the current purchase order status from which a transition is permitted for the specified profile; values reference the PO status code list.
Code for the target purchase order status that the profile is allowed to set; values reference the PO status code list.
System timestamp of the most recent update to this rule, independent of user audit fields; likely maintained by triggers or application logic (confirm with SME).
Identifier or name of the user who most recently updated this record; likely the login/username, distinct from numeric user_id fields (confirm with SME).
User ID of the account that created this transition rule; enables auditability and accountability.
Timestamp when the transition rule was initially created in the system.
User ID of the account that last updated this record.
Timestamp of the latest user-driven update to this record.
